Cardio.name: Jumping Jacks
steps: Stand upright with feet together, arms at your sides.
Jump your feet out to the sides while raising your arms above your head.
Jump back to the starting position.
Repeat continuously for the duration.

Cardio.name: Burpees
steps: Start in a standing position.
Drop into a squat position and place your hands on the ground.
Kick your feet back into a plank position.
Immediately return your feet to the squat position.
Jump up from the squat and reach your arms overhead.
Repeat.

Cardio.name: Mountain Climbers
steps: Start in a plank position.
Bring your right knee towards your chest.
Switch legs quickly, bringing your left knee forward as your right goes back.
Continue alternating legs at a fast pace.

Cardio.name: High Knees
steps: Stand upright with feet hip-width apart.
Lift your knees towards your chest as high as possible, one at a time.
Pump your arms as you move.
Maintain a fast pace throughout.

Cardio.name: Running in Place
steps: Stand upright with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lift your knees and run in place.
Swing your arms naturally.
Keep a steady pace for the duration.

Cardio.name: Skater Jumps
steps: Stand on your right leg with left leg bent behind you.
Jump sideways to the left, landing on your left leg.
Swing your right leg behind you and arms for balance.
Continue jumping side to side.

Cardio.name: Jump Rope
steps: Hold the rope handles in each hand.
Swing the rope over your head and jump as it passes your feet.
Keep a steady rhythm and pace.
Continue for the set duration.

Cardio.name: Butt Kicks
steps: Stand upright with feet hip-width apart.
Kick your heels up towards your glutes alternately.
Pump your arms naturally.
Keep moving at a consistent pace.

Cardio.name: Sprint Intervals
steps: Sprint at maximum effort for 30 seconds.
Walk or jog for 1 minute to recover.
Repeat the sprint/rest cycle for the duration.

Cardio.name: Side Shuffles
steps: Stand with knees slightly bent.
Shuffle to the right quickly for 3-5 steps.
Shuffle back to the left.
Keep your torso low and move quickly.

Back.name: Pull Ups
steps: Grab a pull-up bar with palms facing away from you.
Hang with arms fully extended.
Pull your body up until your chin is over the bar.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Back.name: Deadlift
steps: Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell in front.
Bend at hips and knees to grab the bar.
Lift the bar by straightening your legs and back.
Lower it slowly back to the ground and repeat.

Back.name: Bent Over Rows
steps: Hold dumbbells in both hands.
Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight.
Pull dumbbells to your torso.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Back.name: Lat Pulldown
Back.description: Focus on lats and upper back.
steps: Sit at lat pulldown machine, grab bar wider than shoulders.
Pull the bar to your chest.
Slowly return to starting position.
Repeat.

Back.name: Superman
steps: Lie face down on the floor, arms extended forward.
Lift arms, chest, and legs off the ground.
Hold for 2-3 seconds.
Lower and repeat.

Back.name: Seated Rows
steps: Sit at row machine, feet on footrest.
Grab handles and pull towards your torso.
Squeeze shoulder blades together.
Return slowly and repeat.

Back.name: Reverse Fly
steps: Hold dumbbells, bend slightly at waist.
Raise arms to side until level with shoulders.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Back.name: Chin Ups
steps: Grab bar with palms facing you.
Pull body up until chin reaches the bar.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Back.name: Good Mornings
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bar on shoulders.
Hinge at hips keeping back straight, bend forward.
Return to upright position and repeat.

Back.name: Hyperextensions
steps: Lie face down on hyperextension bench.
Cross arms over chest.
Lift upper body until spine is in line with legs.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Chest.name: Push Ups
steps: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.
Push back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the duration.

Chest.name: Bench Press
steps: Lie on the bench with feet flat on the floor.
Grab the barbell with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Lower the bar to your chest.
Press it back up until arms are extended.
Repeat.

Chest.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
steps: Set bench to 30-45 degrees incline.
Hold dumbbells at chest level.
Press dumbbells upward until arms are extended.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Chest.name: Chest Fly
steps: Lie on a flat bench with dumbbells in each hand.
Extend arms above chest, palms facing each other.
Lower arms wide until chest stretches.
Bring arms back together and repeat.

Chest.name: Cable Crossover
steps: Stand in the middle of cable machine.
Grab handles with each hand.
Pull handles together in front of chest.
Return slowly and repeat.

Chest.name: Incline Push Ups
steps: Place hands on elevated surface (bench).
Lower chest to bench and push back up.
Repeat for duration.

Chest.name: Decline Push Ups
steps: Place feet on elevated surface.
Lower chest to floor and push up.
Repeat for duration.

Chest.name: Diamond Push Ups
steps: Place hands together under chest forming a diamond.
Lower chest to hands and push up.
Repeat.

Chest.name: Pec Deck Machine
steps: Sit at the machine with back against pad.
Place forearms on pads and bring arms together.
Return slowly and repeat.

Chest.name: Push Up with Rotation
steps: Do a regular push-up.
Rotate your body to one side, lifting one arm up.
Return to push-up and rotate to other side.
Repeat.

Legs.name: Squats
Legs.description: Build leg muscles and improve balance.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower body until thighs are parallel to floor.
Push through heels to return to start.
Repeat.

Legs.name: Lunges
steps: Step forward with one leg.
Lower body until front thigh is parallel to floor.
Push back to starting position.
Switch legs and repeat.

Legs.name: Leg Press
steps: Sit on leg press machine, feet shoulder-width on platform.
Push platform away, extending legs without locking knees.
Return slowly and repeat.

Legs.name: Calf Raises
steps: Stand upright on edge of step.
Lift heels as high as possible.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Legs.name: Glute Bridges
steps: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat.
Lift hips until shoulders-knees-hips form a line.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Legs.name: Step Ups
steps: Step onto a sturdy platform with right foot.
Bring left foot up, stand tall.
Step down with right foot, then left.
Repeat switching leading leg.

Legs.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
steps: Stand a few feet in front of bench, one foot on bench behind you.
Lower body until front thigh parallel to floor.
Push back to start and repeat.

Legs.name: Leg Extensions
steps: Sit on leg extension machine.
Extend legs until parallel to floor.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Legs.name: Hamstring Curls
steps: Lie face down on hamstring curl machine.
Curl legs towards glutes.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Legs.name: Side Lunges
steps: Stand with feet hip-width apart.
Step to right, bend right knee, keep left leg straight.
Push back to center and switch sides.
Repeat.

Biceps.name: Bicep Curls
steps: Stand with dumbbells in each hand, arms at sides.
Curl dumbbells toward shoulders.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Biceps.name: Hammer Curls
steps: Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other.
Curl dumbbells toward shoulders.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Biceps.name: Concentration Curls
steps: Sit on bench, hold dumbbell with one hand.
Rest elbow on inner thigh.
Curl dumbbell slowly, squeeze bicep.
Lower and repeat.

Biceps.name: Preacher Curls
steps: Sit on preacher bench, arms over pad holding dumbbells.
Curl weights towards shoulders.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Biceps.name: Cable Curls
steps: Stand at cable machine with bar attachment.
Curl bar toward shoulders.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Biceps.name: Incline Dumbbell Curls
steps: Sit on incline bench holding dumbbells.
Curl arms toward shoulders slowly.
Lower and repeat.

Biceps.name: Zottman Curls
steps: Curl dumbbells with palms up.
Rotate wrists palms down at top.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Biceps.name: Reverse Curls
steps: Hold dumbbells with palms facing down.
Curl weights toward shoulders.
Lower slowly and repeat.

Biceps.name: 21s Curls
steps: Perform 7 partial bottom curls, 7 partial top curls, 7 full curls.
Repeat sequence.

Biceps.name: Cross-body Hammer Curls
steps: Hold dumbbell in right hand.
Curl across body to left shoulder.
Switch sides and repeat.

Triceps.name: Tricep Dips
steps: Place hands behind on bench, feet forward.
Lower body by bending elbows.
Push back up and repeat.

Triceps.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
steps: Hold dumbbell overhead with both hands.
Lower behind head by bending elbows.
Raise back and repeat.

Triceps.name: Tricep Kickbacks
steps: Hold dumbbells, bend torso forward.
Push dumbbells backward, extending arms fully.
Return slowly and repeat.

Triceps.name: Close-grip Bench Press
steps: Lie on bench, grip bar narrower than shoulder width.
Lower to chest and push back up.
Repeat.

Triceps.name: Skull Crushers
steps: Lie on bench with barbell/dumbbells.
Lower weight toward forehead.
Extend arms back to start.

Triceps.name: Rope Pushdowns
steps: Stand at cable machine, grab rope with palms facing each other.
Push rope down until arms fully extended.
Return slowly and repeat.

Triceps.name: Diamond Push Ups
steps: Hands together under chest forming diamond.
Lower chest to hands and push up.
Repeat.

Triceps.name: Bench Dips with Feet Elevated
steps: Place hands behind on bench, feet on elevated surface.
Lower and raise body by bending elbows.
Repeat.

Triceps.name: One Arm Overhead Extension
steps: Hold dumbbell in one hand overhead.
Lower behind head and raise.
Switch arms and repeat.

Triceps.name: Tricep Punches
steps: Hold dumbbells at sides.
Punch arms backward extending fully.
Return and repeat.
